ValidationRule.description: User cannot SQL a contact when the fields on Account (Company Size New, Subregion) are not filled.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(Contains($Profile.Name, "System Administrator")), ISPICKVAL( Status__c ,"Sales Qualified"), OR( ISPICKVAL(Account.Sales_Region__c,""), ISPICKVAL(Account.Company_Size_New__c ,"") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill in Company Size and Subregion Account level first.
